about.description:
Skills:
HTML, CSS, MySQL, PostgreSQL, Docker, Maven, JUnit, Java SE, JavaFX, Spring boot, Spring Security, Thymeleaf, GitHub, Agile Methodologies, Integrated Development Environment - Intellij IDEA.

Developed:

- Creating a search engine. Search for books in the library according to the specified criteria.
Spring, Angular.
https://github.com/GaileAlex/librarian.

- This site, the following technologies are used HTML, CSS, Spring boot, Spring Security, Thymeleaf, Hibernate, PostgreSQL, Maven (blocks - "Blog" and "Spring projects"). The site is hosted on its own hosting managed by the Tomcat server.
https://github.com/GaileAlex/cv.

- Test task "Crypto Portfolio".
Backend system is written in Java using Spring Boot framework,
Database to store the portfolio data is PostgreSQL.
Backend system serves all the services via JSON microservice.
Frontend layer uses PrimeNG and AngularJS and communicates with backend by calling JSON rest services.
Link - https://github.com/GaileAlex/mindly.

These applications and code can be viewed - https://github.com/GaileAlex.

Sociable, fast learning, punctual. I devote all my free time to self-study.

portfolio.description4:
Development of an automated test script.
The graphic part is JavaFX, data is stored in the data.csv file, as well as in the MySQL database, it is possible to switch between data storage options.
2019.
portfolio.description5:
Test task "Crypto Portfolio".
Spring boot, Thymeleaf, PostgreSQL, Json.
2019
portfolio.description6:
GoSwift - application for tracking the live queue on the border of Estonia. You can specify your conditions in the queue of vehicles or waiting time, at which point the application will give you a signal. The application collects data from the site https://www.estonianborder.eu/. The Jsoup library is used. Created by JavaFx.
2018.

experience.job-2.description:
Construction company

- Independently created a company website.
- Created a network and electronic document management.
- Increased the company's revenue more than four times.
- Established relationships with suppliers.
- Increased the number of regular customers.
experience.job-3.description:
Construction company

- Founded the company.
- Assembled a talented team of professionals.
- Established relationships with suppliers.
- Collected a portfolio of orders.
- Found large corporate clients.

education.education-1.description:
Software Developer.

During my studies I studied the following technologies - HTML, CSS, MySQL, PostgreSQL, Hibernate, Maven, JUnit, Java SE, JavaFX, Spring boot, Spring Security, Thymeleaf, GitHub, Agile Methodologies.

Developed:

- Application for tracking live queues at the border. JavaFX, Jsoup (the program parses the data from the site https://www.estonianborder.eu.) - https://github.com/GaileAlex/GoSwift.

- The application emulates the store operation (test task found on the Internet).JavaFx, MySQL - https://github.com/GaileAlex/Shop-Emulation

Thesis:
- CV website creation, the following technologies are used: HTML, CSS, Spring boot, Spring Security, Thymeleaf, Hibernate, PostgreSQL, Maven. The site is hosted on its own hosting managed by the Tomcat server.
